data.message:
T

With in this message is the way you live

wake up 

Day after day workers get slaved

the money you make gets taken 

Away 

People you love complaining 

About material things

That shouldn't make a change 

brings nothing but pain.

Drives you insane

 In tell there's no one left to blame 

The government fucksus with video games

An simple things 

Killing us in the food we eat

An people are to ignorant to see

They take our wealth by destroying our health
